item.description:
Wayne will be headed to PAX East next weekend in Boston, MA. Will you be there?

If you will be there let me know! This will be my 3rd year attending the convention and I'm always looking for gamers to fill out games, and to walk around with.

Tweet @SagesOfRPG or email me to get a cell number so we can meetup.

 

300 Facebook Likes by the end of PAX East!

I'm trying to get to 300 likes on the Sages of RPG Facebook page by midnight next Saturday.

So please LIKE Sages on Facebook and help out!

 

What is PAX East?

A HUGE gaming convention in Boston, MA. Visit their website to learn more or to snag a badge for Friday / Sunday.

http://east.paxsite.com/what-is-pax
item.how_to_find_us: Tweet - @SagesOfRPG or email me for my cell phone.

group.name: The Portsmouth, NH / Seacoast Boardgames Group

item.name: PAX East 2012 - Saturday
